resources.string: AIT App Competition submission by Jason Wangsadinata
Click on the name to find out about them..
The password should not be empty
This app is project done by Jason Wangsadinata for the AIT Mobile Software Development App Competition

This app allows you to check out on your friends, your cool professors or even your favorite staff and send them a message, or keep in touch with them through popular social media. It is a simple way to stay connected.

The reason for creating this app, is for all AIT students, to still remember all the good times, all the great friends and memories that we have made in this semester. I certainly hope that we can still stay in touch (hence the name of the app) even until we have left AIT.

AIT was such a wonderful program. Many students from different schools, different background came to this program, and become very close friends. With the end of the semester approaching, many of us have come to the realization that we will eventually have to go to our separate ways.
